channel.title: Mods think im andrew gower lol :)
channel.description:
well im going about my usual business on runescape... when a mod randomly messsages me... we keep talking for a while and im like ok :S what ever. then after a while he says, i know who you are its ok. i was like ummm no? he said he knew i was a "gold" (gold crown mod) then her/his friend who was also mod started messaging me also. and i was like dudes you got the wrong guy lol.. anyways the conversation went on for a while and he still thinks im andrew right now. i'll post a screenie now.
[IMG]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p80/davidude36/imnotandrew2.jpg[/img]
also i think they think i was andrew because i have a REALLY GOOD runescape name. i might post it but im not sure because of the whole jagex bannings because of it.

item.title: Mods think im andrew gower lol :)

Show’s how much Player Mods know these days…

I thought he just did?
